description:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/987055 removed HACKING checks b/c deprecation warnings relating to the `md5` library were be generated.

Although we can't use the HACKING tool until it's made more robust, we can still use the pep8 tool, which would be useful in keeping the Python2.4 code as clean as possible
title: Add PEP8 checks back for Dom0 plugins

comments.content:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/987055 removed HACKING checks b/c deprecation warnings relating to the `md5` library were be generated.

Although we can't use the HACKING tool until it's made more robust, we can still use the pep8 tool, which would be useful in keeping the Python2.4 code as clean as possible
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris
